name: Everything is (not) Real
description:
Controls: 

WASD - movement

F - switch to reality or abyss

Main task

Main task is to collect 9 crystals that you can see only in abyss but ghosts will try to kill you, and every time you collect crystal something will change. Very simple, isn't it?

Game maybe confusing, but you can look at screenshots to see what you need to find, Good Luck!

# This is my first game so  i am not very good at game design so spend a lot time brainstorming and reflected on code quality. Feel free to report bug, maybe will fix them later
